articles.title: DPRK Government's Memorandum on Kim Jong Un's Exploits
articles.content:
DPRK Government's Memorandum on Kim Jong Un's Exploits
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The DPRK government Thursday released a memorandum titled "The immortal feats, performed by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un to most strikingly demonstrate the dignity and might of our Republic under the uplifted great banner of simultaneously developing the two fronts, will shine forever."
					 The memorandum referred to the fact that Kim Jong Un made an epoch-making declaration indicating the way of independence and justice on March 31, 2013.
					
					 He laid down a fresh strategic line of simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of nuclear force at the March 2013 Plenary Meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 He set the line as a strategic one of the party and the state by carrying forward the exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who accomplished the great cause of having access to nuclear weapons despite all difficulties. He thus broke the world political structure centered on the existing nuclear powers and fundamentally changed the world political landscape and made the DPRK demonstrate its dignity as the most powerful country which no one dares to provoke.
					
					 The fresh line provided the army and people of the DPRK with a firm guarantee for frustrating the U.S. imperialists' wild ambition to annex the northern half of the Republic and reduce all Koreans to modern-day slaves by taking a firmer hold on the nuclear shield for self-defence and reliably protecting their ideology, social system and right to existence.
					
					 His presentation of the line marked an event to be specially recorded as it opened a new phase in the development of the revolutionary ideology and theories in the era of independence.
					
					 Noting that the line has resulted in creating legendary stories about heroes and bringing about all blessings, the memorandum said:
					
					 The respected Supreme Leader has energetically guided an epoch-making great cause of bolstering up the nuclear deterrence of Juche Korea for self-defence in every way, determined to successfully accomplish the great leaders' cause of building a nuclear power.
					
					 In order to provide a powerful military guarantee for defending the sovereignty of the country and destiny of the nation and victoriously pushing forward the cause of building a socialist power, he has always made trips to the front despite strong wind to guide various forms of military drills by units of the Korean People's Army under the banner of simultaneously developing the two fronts. 
					
					 Thanks to his indefatigable efforts and dedication, the DPRK could emerge with dignity a nuclear power in the East and the world's military power.
					
					 The past four years, during which the army and people of the DPRK have worked hard to implement the line set forth by Kim Jong Un, are woven with historic events in which they have brought about spectacular leap forward and miracles in the drive to build a socialist economic giant and a highly-civilized nation and improve the standard of people's living by racing against time.
					
					 The memorandum also referred to the facts that the world people have expressed great joy and appreciation of the reality in the DPRK dashing ahead like the wind towards the greatest victory under the banner of the above-said line.
					
					 It praised Kim Jong Un as the peerless patriot and great guardian of independence and justice as he has performed undying feats for the country and the nation, the times and mankind by advancing and creditably implementing the fresh line of simultaneously developing the two fronts to turn the DPRK into a matchless nuclear power and usher in a golden age of prosperity. 
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will further reinforce a nuclear sword for self-defence, the life and soul of the nation and national treasure of reunified Korea, and dash ahead like the wind towards the high eminence of prosperity with the strength, spirit and speed of Korea, holding higher the banner of simultaneously developing the two fronts under the guidance of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: KAPPC Spokesman Slams U.S. for Scheme to Keep Its Colonial Rule over S. Korea
articles.content:
KAPPC Spokesman Slams U.S. for Scheme to Keep Its Colonial Rule over S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Korea Asia-Pacific Peace Committee released a statement on Friday as regards the fact that the U.S. is running the whole gamut of intrigues to tighten its colonial domination over south Korea and persist in its hostile policy towards the DPRK as it feels uneasy about the increasing likelihood of the collapse of the pro-U.S. conservative "government" and the victory of the progressive and pro-reform forces in the coming "presidential" election.
					 Shortly ago, the special representative for DPRK policy of the U.S. Department of State met figures of major opposition parties of south Korea to tap their attitude toward the deployment of THAAD and "nuclear issue of the north" and busied himself pressing them to accept its hostile policy toward the DPRK. Early in February the director general of the Atlantic Council of the U.S., one of the confidants of Trump, flew into south Korea in secret. When coming in touch with a "presidential" candidate from an opposition party, he tried to "verify" the former's "view on the U.S. and north Korea".
					
					 The U.S. is openly wooing senior officials of the White House and the administration, congressmen and media into underscoring the need  to prioritize the alliance with south Korea and strengthen it regardless of which regime appears there and steadily maintain the foundation of sanctions against the DPRK. It seeks to effect the deployment of THAAD before the "presidential" election so that the next regime may not reverse it.
					
					 These moves are open high-handed practices for forcing the next regime to follow the policy of confrontation with the fellow countrymen pursued by the Park Geun Hye group of traitors in a bid to keep its system for domination, use south Korea as its permanent colony and outpost for carrying out its strategy for dominating Asia-Pacific, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The massive candlelight actions of south Korean people, which culminated in removing traitor Park Geun Hye from office, were an eruption of their bitter resentment against her "government's" despicable submission and sycophancy towards outside forces and an expression of their strong desire to win back the usurped sovereignty.
					
					 The gangster-like U.S. is the chieftain who has inflicted untold pain and misfortune upon the south Korean people and arch criminal disturbing national reconciliation, unity and reunification and threatening peace and security on the Korean Peninsula and in the region.
					
					 The tragic reality of south Korea goes to clearly prove that sycophancy towards the U.S. and submission to it lead to national ruin and destruction but national independence is the way to survive and achieve reunification.

articles.title: KSDP Sends Appeal to Parties, Organizations and Personages of S. Korea
articles.content:
KSDP Sends Appeal to Parties, Organizations and Personages of S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Korean Social Democratic Party Friday sent an appeal to the political parties, organizations and personages of different social standings in south Korea.
					 The situation remains so tense on the Korean peninsula due to the reckless nuclear war drills being staged by the U.S. and south Korean military gangsters that a nuclear war may break out any moment, the appeal said, and went on:
					
					 Different forms of war drills for aggression on the north were staged in south Korea every year but never there has been such worst saber-rattling in its nature, goal and scale as the on-going war rehearsals.
					
					 The reality goes to prove that the moves of the U.S. imperialists for a nuclear war have gone beyond the critical phase.
					
					 All Koreans should turn out in the struggle to resolutely check the reckless nuclear war drills of the U.S. and south Korean warmongers.
					
					 It is the stand of our Social Democratic Party that to prevent a war and protect peace is the way for defending the life of the fellow countrymen and safety of the nation.
					
					 All the parties and people from all walks of life in south Korea should rise up in the anti-U.S., anti-war struggle for peace, clearly seeing through the nature of the U.S., the chieftain of aggression and disturber of peace.
					
					 It is the urgent demand for preventing a war and protecting peace to wipe out the traitors bringing a nuclear war disaster while serving the U.S. in disregard of the destiny and interests of the nation.
					
					 All the south Korean people should dynamically turn out in the actions to make a clean sweep of the elements keen on confrontation with the fellow countrymen and war maniacs, holding higher the candlelight of justice which severely punished the worst sycophant and traitor Park Geun Hye.
					
					 The KSDP is convinced that political parties, organizations and people of different social standings in south Korea who love justice and peace will courageously turn out in the sacred struggle for peace against war and independent reunification in hearty response to our patriotic call.

articles.title: Appeal of Chondoist Chongu Party to S. Koreans
articles.content:
Appeal of Chondoist Chongu Party to S. Koreans
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Chondoist Chongu Party sent an appeal to the political parties, organizations and personages of different circles in south Korea on Friday.
					 The appeal branded  the joint military exercises now under way in south Korea as the most vicious and shameless actions in history for igniting the second Korean war.
					
					 A war has become a stark reality and the nation is at crossroads of whether it suffers a nuclear war disaster at the hands of outsiders or defends the security and peace of the nation by the concerted efforts of the Koreans, the appeal said, and went on:
					
					 Now is the time for all those who love the country and the nation and are worried about the destiny of the nation to put the nation's cause above partisan interests, religious belief and ism and turn out as one in the righteous patriotic struggle for fending off the danger of a nuclear war and safeguarding peace.
					
					 The Central Committee of the Chondoist Chongu Party ardently appeals to all political parties, organizations and personages of different circles in south Korea to turn out in the struggle for defending the peace of the Korean peninsula and the security of the nation under the prevailing grave situation.
					
					 Peace and security of the Korean peninsula are a vital issue directly related to the destiny of the Korean nation.
					
					 Defence of peace is the way for the nation to survive and achieve reunification and prosperity common to it.
					
					 All parties and people of all social standings in south Korea have to turn out in the struggle to resolutely oppose and reject the DPRK-targeted nuclear war exercises aimed at inflicting nuclear holocaust over the nation, under the slogan of peace against the U.S. and war.
					
					 The security and peace of the nation would be unthinkable apart from the struggle to wipe out the traitors who are keen on escalating confrontation with the fellow countrymen and igniting a war as henchmen of the U.S.
					
					 The Chondoists in the north and the south have to achieve unity and take the lead in the just patriotic war for resolutely foiling the reckless military provocation and nuclear war moves of the war-like forces at home and abroad.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Placed under Restraint at Seoul Detention House
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Placed under Restraint at Seoul Detention House
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- An examination took place at the Seoul Central District Court of south Korea on Mar. 30 to decide the arrest of Park Geun Hye amid the dynamic struggle by people of all social strata calling for placing her under restraint.
					 Accordingly traitor Park was sent under escort to Seoul detention house to be thrown into a solitary cell in a prisoner uniform at the dawn of Friday after the lapse of 21 days since she was impeached.
					
					 The south Korean media and majority of the people welcomed the arrest of Park and asserted that she should be severely punished.

articles.title: 5th April Spring People's Art Festival to Be Held
articles.content:
5th April Spring People's Art Festival to Be Held
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The 5th April Spring People's Art Festival will be held in Pyongyang to celebrate the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The festival will bring together members of art troupes and squads and itinerant art groups and members of art groups in Pyongyang and provinces.
					
					 Divided into 4 different categories, it will take place at theatres and cultural houses from April 10 to 17. A magic festival will also be included in it.

articles.title: Pridnestrovie Communist Party Signs Pyongyang Declaration
articles.content:
Pridnestrovie Communist Party Signs Pyongyang Declaration
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Pridnestrovie Communist Party signed the Pyongyang declaration "Let Us Defend and Advance the Cause of Socialism" on Friday.
					 Oleg Khorzhan, chairman of the C.C., Pridnestrovie Communist Party who is on a visit to the DPRK, inked the declaration on behalf of the party.
					
					 He said with joy that the party came to swim with the trend of the times, noting the declaration serves as the banner of victory for the socialist cause.

articles.title: Exhibition of Building Fixtures for Samjiyon County Closes
articles.content:
Exhibition of Building Fixtures for Samjiyon County Closes
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- An exhibition of building fixtures for Samjiyon County came to a close with due ceremony at the Sci-Tech Complex on Friday. It was opened on March 27.
					 Displayed there were hundreds of fixtures made with locally available materials.
					
					 Present at the closing ceremony were Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK, Ro Tu Chol, vice-premier and chairman of the State Planning Commission, Ri Chung Gil, chairman of the State Science and Technology Commission, Sim Yong Hak, chairman of the Central Committee of the Architects Union of Korea, officials concerned and officials of those units which contributed to the exhibition.
					
					 Top and excellent diploma were awarded to the 75 successful units, individual Top and excellent diploma to 146 persons, certificate of registration of scientific and technical achievements to 7 persons, invention certificate to 19 persons and certificate of registration of February 2 products to 12 products.

articles.title: New Stamps Issued in DPRK
articles.content:
New Stamps Issued in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The State Stamp Bureau of the DPRK issued new stamps (two individuals) introducing the Pyongyang Corn Processing Factory and a subway train.
					 The Pyongyang Corn Processing Factory was remodeled on the 70th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The factory covers an area of more than 12,800 square meters and all its production processes ranging from raw material feeding to packing are put on an unmanned, germ-free and dust-free basis. It produces noodle, crushed corn, sweet jelly and other processed corn products, contributing to citizens' diet.
					
					 The subway train made by workers of the Kim Jong Thae Electric Locomotive Complex, a leading vehicle producer of the country, is a product made by the working class of the DPRK in the spirit of self-reliance and self-development.

articles.title: Coal Output Increases in DPRK
articles.content:
Coal Output Increases in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Coal mines in the DPRK have produced 40 000 more tons of coal than scheduled in March, according to data available from the Ministry of Coal Industry.
					 Kim Chang Sok, department director of the ministry, told KCNA:
					
					 Coal mining complexes across the country are boosting the production by giving precedence to tunneling and through rational mining methods.
					
					 Coal mines under the Sunchon Area Youth Coal Mining Complex are overfulfilling their capital tunneling assignments every day.
					
					 The Tukjang, Kaechon and Myongchon area coal mining complexes are directing efforts to slope pit tunneling for deep mining and increasing more coal than planned.
					
					 The Tokchon, Pukchang and other area coal mining complexes have introduced tunneling methods suited to the coal-bed conditions to overfulfill their daily quotas.

articles.title: Central Surveying Corps in DPRK
articles.content:
Central Surveying Corps in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The Central Surveying Corps under the Ministry of National Natural Resources Development is a powerful base of surveying and mapping in the DPRK.
					 The corps was organized on April 1, Juche 51 (1962) on the initiative of President Kim Il Sung. Over the past 55 years, it has played a decisive role in surveying various economic sectors and major construction projects and mapping out land development.
					
					 Choe Yong Chon, chief engineer of the corps, told KCNA:
					
					 Under the guidance of the Workers' Party of Korea, the corps has developed into an excellent surveying and mapping base equipped with modern facilities.
					
					 It has successfully carried out the survey and measuring of the whole country, including site survey for mining areas, measuring for prospect and mining design of the Musan area, survey of trees bearing slogans and survey for the construction of Ryongmun Cavern.
					
					 Last year it finished the leveling work for the construction of the Tanchon Power Station in a short span of time, thus rendering services to its design.
					
					 And it mapped out a master plan for the development of national hydraulic resources and solid maps of projects in various sectors for the first time.
					
					 It completed a comprehensive and unified survey base network on a nationwide scale and a topographic map on a scale of 1 to 10,000, thus providing a foundation of making a prompt and correct survey of any project in various economic sectors and contributing to hastening the development of underground resources and the national economic development.
					
					 It has made surveying instruments and established methods of making optical system of surveying equipment and micrometer system.
					
					 Meanwhile, it also made tens of equipment and 50 technical outfits including lens grinding and paper-producing equipment.
					
					 The Central Surveying Corps is now directing efforts to putting the surveying and mapping on an ultra-modern basis.

articles.title: Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism Is Ever-victorious Banner for Korean Revolution: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism Is Ever-victorious Banner for Korean Revolution: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Today marks the 35th publication anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's work "On the Juche Idea".
					 Rodong Sinmun on Friday in an article says:
					
					 The work serves as an immortal encyclopedia comprehensively dealing with the Juche idea, the guiding idea of the Korean revolution, and as a genuine textbook and powerful ideo-theoretical weapon for the life and struggle of the popular masses desirous of independence.
					
					 Since its publication, the truth and vitality of the Juche idea has been displayed to the full.
					
					 Kim Jong Il formulated the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung as Kimilsungism and enriched the treasure house of the Juche idea through his energetic ideo-theoretical activities.
					
					 He led the revolution and construction to victory by pursuing the original Songun politics in so difficult days of the Arduous March. This is the admirable feat he performed before the country and its people.
					
					 Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un remarkably developed and enriched Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism as the eternal guiding ideology of our Party and revolution by conducting energetic ideol-theoretical activities with his far-sighted wisdom and proclaimed it as the supreme programme of the Party to model the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism is an integral system of the immortal Juche idea and theories and methods for the revolution and construction clarified by it and the great revolutionary idea representing the era of independence.
					
					 Korean-style socialism has victoriously advanced along the orbit of Juche even in the intricate vortex of world politics and the DPRK emerged a nuclear power and military power in the East which no formidable enemy dares to provoke. This is a clear proof of the validity and vitality of great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism is an eternal guideline and an invincible banner of the Korean revolution, concludes the article.

articles.title: U.S. Preemptive Attack on DPRK Will Lead to Its Final Doom: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Preemptive Attack on DPRK Will Lead to Its Final Doom: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The U.S. can never escape the catastrophic consequences to be entailed by its reckless scenario for a preemptive attack on the DPRK and this will lead to its final destruction, warns Rodong Sinmun Friday in an article.
					 The article says:
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces are now staging large-scale joint military drills in real earnest in south Korea under the simulated conditions of mounting a preemptive attack on the DPRK.
					
					 Consequently, the situation of the Korean peninsula remains so tense that a nuclear war may break out any moment. 
					
					 Against this backdrop the U.S. is spreading rumor that it excluded the scenario for preemptive attack on the DPRK from its policy toward the latter.
					
					 Such rumor is nothing but impudent chicanery to mislead the public opinion at home and abroad.
					
					 The U.S. remains unchanged in its scenario for invading the DPRK through a preemptive attack.
					
					 By pretending to have abandoned its plan for mounting a preemptive attack, the U.S. seeks an ulterior purpose. It is to calm down the domestic and foreign public criticism and denunciation of the U.S. extreme policy toward the DPRK and weaken the DPRK's toughest counteraction in a bid to realize the U.S. scenario for preemptive attack on it come what may.
					
					 The preemptive attack is no monopoly of the U.S., the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 If the U.S. misjudges the DPRK's will for counteraction and shows the slightest sign of preemptive attack, the powerful nuclear strike means of the invincible revolutionary Paektusan army will mercilessly reduce to ashes the stronghold of provocateurs through Korean-style preemptive and offensive nuclear strikes.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to ponder over the DPRK's warning and cool off its heads heated with war hysteria and behave with prudence and self-control.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. Scenario to Stifle DPRK by Force of Arms
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. Scenario to Stifle DPRK by Force of Arms
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The U.S. forces in south Korea recently began to introduce latest type Grey Eagle drones into the Kunsan base. They claim that the operation sphere of this attack drone covers the whole of the Korean peninsula and it is capable of directly striking major targets of the DPRK as it is equipped with anti-tank missiles and smaller precision guided bombs.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday in a commentary terms this another dangerous military action pushing the situation to an extreme phase.
					
					 The U.S. warmongers' introduction of such attack drones goes to prove that their scheme for a war against the DPRK has gone beyond the red line, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean warmongers are busy with drills for making precision strike at the major facilities of the DPRK after kicking off war rehearsals for aggression on it under the premeditated strategy for preemptive nuclear attack. They are now going under the simulated conditions of an actual war after the deployment of THAAD in south Korea. 
					
					 Meanwhile, the Japan Maritime "Self-Defense Force" openly waged a drill for intercepting missiles from the DPRK together with the U.S. and south Korean forces.
					
					 In fact, the on-going joint military drills assume graver nature due to closer military alliance among the U.S., Japan and south Korea and their intensified war moves.
					
					 The U.S. arms buildup in south Korea would be unthinkable without the Trump administration's DPRK policy.
					
					 The Trump administration, panic-stricken by the legacy of the Obama administration's failed DPRK policy, is attempting to stifle the DPRK by force of arms as early as possible by mobilizing all the nuclear strategic assets.
					
					 The U.S. scenario to bring down the DPRK by force of arms is foolish as trying to sweep the sea with a broom.

articles.title: Minju Joson Flails S. Korean Unification Ministry's Moves to Justify Confrontation Policy
articles.content:
Minju Joson Flails S. Korean Unification Ministry's Moves to Justify Confrontation Policy 
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Hong Yong Phyo and other mandarins of the puppet Ministry of Unification of south Korea recently let out a flurry of malignant invective to mislead the public opinion and block the mending of the inter-Korean ties by claiming that the north was to blame for the total shutdown of the Kaesong Industrial Park (KIP), trumpeting about "its threat and provocation" and crying out for "sanctions and pressure on the north" and "change in its attitude."
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Friday says:
					
					 This is sheer sophism of the group of traitors to justify the confrontation policy that brought the north-south relations to a total collapse.
					
					 The suspended cooperation and exchange between the north and the south including the operation in the KIP was a tragedy caused by the mandarins of the ministry, the worst traitors and hordes of confrontation-minded servants, who are utterly indifferent to the desire and wishes of the nation and tremendous losses brought not only to so many businesses in the KIP and cooperative enterprises but to the overall economy of south Korea.
					
					 Their disgraceful behavior is a blatant challenge and mockery of the south Korean people calling for the total scrapping of all treacherous policies of impeached traitor Park Geun Hye. 
					
					 Lurking behind their desperate frenzy is a cynical ploy to bar the north-south relations from improving even after the "presidential election" and the regime change.
					
					 It is as plain as a pikestaff that the north-south relations cannot be repaired and the south Korean people can never get rid of misfortune and sufferings as long as the traitors of the ministry are allowed to be at large.

articles.title: S. Korean Society Plagued by Lies
articles.content:
S. Korean Society Plagued by Lies
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Lies and deception have become endemic in south Korea, causing a serious social problem, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					 An opinion poll conducted by the media promotion foundation on March 29 clarified the majority of respondents answered that they doubt even when they hear true news.
					
					 They worried about the serious problem caused by false news in the south Korean society, commenting this has deepened social division.
					
					 The CBS comment that south Korea is full of lies is a clear proof of the deplorable situation in south Korea plagued by deception, swindling, corruption and irregularities.

articles.title: Rally on Situation Held in S. Korea
articles.content:
Rally on Situation Held in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Members of civic and social organizations in south Korea, including the special committee for detaining plutocrats of the People's Emergency Action for Resignation of Park Geun Hye Regime and the Action for Checking THAAD Deployment, held a rally on the situation in Seoul on March 29 in order to check THAAD deployment, disclose the truth behind the ferry Sewol disaster, abolish evils of the puppet regime and build a new society, according to the south Korean internet paper Tongil News.
					 A declaration on the situation was read out at the rally.
					
					 Stating that impeachment of Park Geun Hye is the victory of the candlelight resistance, the declaration expressed the will to hold a rally at Kwanghwamun Plaza on April 1 and show the people's determination to liquidate Hwang Kyo An and other remnants of Park's group and build a new civic society.

articles.title: Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung Observed by Foreign Bodies
articles.content:
Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung Observed by Foreign Bodies
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Organizations in different countries posted special write-ups on their websites between March 13 and 22 to observe the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The Mexican National Preparatory Committee for Celebrating the Day of the Sun posted articles under such titles as "Kim Il Sung, distinguished statesman in 20th century ", "Founder of socialist Korea", "Songun politics and peace" and "DPRK, independent nuclear power" illustrated with photos of the President and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The articles praised the life of the President who dedicated his all to the prosperity of the country, happiness of its people and the human cause of independence.
					
					 The Hungarian Preparatory Committee for Celebrating the Day of the Sun noted in an article that there are many great men recorded in history but such a great man can hardly be found as Kim Il Sung who is revered by all people generation after generation.
					
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted an article telling the story of how a famous Japanese media person was impressed by the noble popular traits and boundless magnanimity of the President after being received by him.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Romania
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Romania
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- A Romanian preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, was formed on Mar. 21.
					 Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Supreme Council of the New Socialist Party of Romania, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee set a celebration period from Mar. 25 to April 20 and decided to hold colorful political and cultural events praising the President's revolutionary career and exploits in the period.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Sweden
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Sweden
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- A Swedish preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, was formed on Mar. 23.
					 Christer Lundgren, chairman of the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association, an executive member of the Goteborg Committee of the Communist Party of Sweden, and Oskar Molleby, chief of the Swedish Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, were elected co-chairmen of the preparatory committee.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Serbia
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Serbia
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- A Serbian preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, was formed in Belgrade on Mar. 23.
					 Marijann Kubik, international secretary of the New Yugoslav Communist Party, was elected chairperson of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize lecture meeting, seminar and other political and cultural events praising the President's revolutionary career and exploits in the period from Mar. 23 to April 16.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Indonesia
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Indonesia
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- An Indonesian preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, was formed on Mar. 23.
					 Ristiyanto, general secretary of the National Guidance Council of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee set a celebration period from Mar. 25 to April 15 and decided to hold colorful political and cultural events praising the President's revolutionary career and exploits in the period.

articles.title: Gobierno de RPDC publica memorando sobre hazanas de Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Gobierno de RPDC publica memorando sobre hazanas de Kim Jong Un
Pyongyang, 31 de marzo (ACNC) -- El gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea publico el dia 30 un memorando intitulado "Brillara para siempre las hazanas inmortales del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un de haber situado en el plano cimero la dignidad y la gallardia de la RPDC con la gran linea de desarrollo paralelo".
					El documento recuerda que el Mariscal hizo el 31 de marzo de 2013 la declaracion del siglo en que indico la via para defender la independencia y justicia.
					
					En el Pleno de Marzo de 2013 del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el presento la nueva linea estrategica de impulsar simultaneamente la construccion economica y la de fuerzas armadas nucleares, especifica el memorando y prosigue:
					
					Al continuar las hazanas del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il quienes cumplieron la causa de posesion de armas nucleares superando toda clase de dificultades, Kim Jong Un presento como linea estrategica del Partido y el Estado el desarrollo paralelo de la construccion economica y la de fuerzas armadas nucleares. Asi rompio la estructura de politica mundial centrada en las potencias nucleares existentes, cambio radicalmente la topografia politica mundial y dignifico a la RPDC como potencia intocable.
					
					Gracias a ello, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea obtuvieron la garantia para frustrar la ambicion del imperialismo norteamericano de anexar a la RPDC y convertir a toda la nacion coreana en esclavos de version moderna y para defender con firmeza su idea, regimen y derecho a la subsistencia empunando mas fuerte el escudo nuclear de autodefensa.
					
					La presentacion de nueva linea estrategica por el Maximo Dirigente deviene un acontecimiento especial que abrio nuevo horizonte para el desarrollo de la idea y teoria revolucionarias de la epoca de independencia.
					
					La linea de desarrollo paralelo engendro mitos y felicidades mas grandes del mundo.
					
					Con la decision de llevar a feliz termino la causa de los grandes Lideres por la construccion de potencia nuclear, Kim Jong Un dirigio energicamente esa obra del siglo para multiplicar el disuasivo nuclear autodefensivo de la Corea del Juche.
					
					Para preparar la garantia militar de defensa de la soberania del pais y el destino de la nacion y de impulso victorioso de la causa de construccion de potencia socialista, el siempre estuvo en el frente dirigiendo entrenamientos militares de todo tipo de las unidades del Ejercito Popular de Corea bajo la bandera de la linea de desarrollo paralelo.
					
					Gracias a su guia incansable y abnegada, la RPDC ocupo la posicion de la potencia nuclear del Oriente y la militar de talla mundial.
					
					Los 4 anos pasados despues de presentacion de la linea estrategica fueron el tiempo de acontecimientos historicos en que el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea registraron grandes saltos y milagros en la construccion de la potencia economica socialista y la civilizada y en el mejoramiento de los niveles de vida del pueblo.
					
					El mundo admira y alaba la realidad de la RPDC que marcha a todo galope hacia la victoria ateniendose a la linea en cuestion.
					
					Kim Jong Un es patriota sin par y gran defensor de la independencia y justicia que al presentar e implementar la nueva linea de desarrollo paralelo, convirtio la RPDC en la potencia nuclear sin rival y abrio la era de esplendor realizando asi indelebles hazanas ante la patria, la nacion, la epoca y la humanidad.
					
					Bajo la direccion de el y en virtud de la nueva linea, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea fortaleceran el medio nuclear autodefensivo, vida de la nacion y patrimonio nacional de Corea reunificada, y marcharan de viento en popa hacia la cumbre de prosperidad demostrando la fuerza, el temperamento y la velocidad de Corea.

articles.title: Portavoz de CCPAP rechaza intento de EE.UU. de mantener sistema de coloniaje
articles.content:
Portavoz de CCPAP rechaza intento de EE.UU. de mantener sistema de coloniaje
Pyongyang, 31 de marzo (ACNC) -- En el Sur de Corea cayo el "poder" conservador proyanqui y se eleva la posibilidad de la toma del poder por parte de las fuerzas reformistas y progresistas en las inminentes elecciones "presidenciales".
					  Inquietado por tal situacion, Estados Unidos recurre a todos los medios para mantener la dominacion colonial sobre el Sur de Corea y la politica hostil contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					  Al respecto, el portavoz del Comite Coreano por la Paz de Asia y el Pacifico (CCPAP) publico el dia 31 una declaracion que sigue:
					
					  Recientemente, el delegado especial para la politica sobre el Norte de Corea del Departamento de Estado de EE.UU. se reunio con las figuras importantes de los partidos opositores surcoreanos para sondearles sus criterios sobre el emplazamiento de THAAD, el "problema nuclear del Norte", etc. e imponerles la politica norteamericana sobre la RPDC.
					
					  Con anterioridad, a principios de febrero, el director general del Consejo Atlantico de EE.UU., colaborador cercano de Trump, visito en secreto al Sur de Corea y tuvo contacto con el candidato "presidencial" del partido opositor para "verificar" su concepcion sobre "EE.UU. y el Norte de Corea".
					
					  Las altas figuras de la Casa Blanca, la administracion, los congresistas y los medios de prensa de EE.UU. presionan abiertamente al Sur de Corea instruyendo asi: "cualquier gobierno que aparezca debe dar importancia a la alianza con EE.UU. y fortalecerla" y "es preciso seguir manteniendo la base de la sancion sobre el Norte".
					
					  Ademas, EE.UU. trata de terminar el despliegue de THAAD antes de las elecciones "presidenciales" en el Sur de Corea para que el proximo "poder" no pueda revocarlo.
					
					  Esto deviene la coaccion abierta encaminada a convertir el Sur de Corea en colonia eterna y usarlo como base avanzada para materializar la estrategia de dominio sobre Asia-Pacifico al hacer al proximo "poder" surcoreano repetir la politica de confrontacion fratricida de la banda traidora de Park Geun-hye y mantener el coloniaje norteamericano.
					
					  La lucha masiva con velas encendidas de los habitantes surcoreanos, que arruinaron a la traidora Park, constituye una manifestacion de la indignacion por la sumision bochornosa a las fuerzas foraneas y el acto vendepatria del "poder" traidor y de la fuerte aspiracion a rescatar la dignidad independiente y los derechos arrebatados.
					
					  EE.UU. es el culpable que impone indecibles sufrimientos y desgracias a los habitantes surcoreanos, impide la reconciliacion y unidad de la nacion coreana y la reunificacion y amenaza la paz y seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y la region.
					
					  La actual realidad tragica del Sur de Corea demuestra claramente que el servilismo y sumision a EE.UU. arruinan el pais y la independencia nacional significa la salvacion y la via de reunificacion.

articles.title: PSDC envia llamamiento a partidos politicos, entidades y figuras del Sur de Corea
articles.content:
PSDC envia llamamiento a partidos politicos, entidades y figuras del Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 31 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Partido Social-Democrata de Corea envio hoy un llamamiento a los partidos politicos, las entidades y las personalidades de diversos estratos del Sur de Corea. 
					La nota senala que debido al imprudente y frenetico simulacro de guerra nuclear que desarrollan ahora los gangsteres militares de Estados Unidos y el Sur de Corea, se crea en la Peninsula Coreana una situacion tan tirante en que puede estallar en cualquier momento la guerra nuclear, y prosigue:
					
					Cada ano se desarrollaban en el suelo surcoreano diferentes entrenamientos de la guerra de agresion a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, pero, nunca hubo el acto provocativo de guerra agresiva tan siniestro y descarado como el presente en su caracter, objetivo y dimension.
					
					La realidad muestra fehacientemente que el imperio norteamericano se propasa con las maniobras de provocacion de guerra nuclear.
					
					Toda la nacion debe levantarse para frustrar tajantemente las imprudentes maniobras militares de los belicistas norteamericanos y surcoreanos. 
					
					El Partido Social-Democrata mantiene la posicion de que para preservar la vida y la seguridad de la nacion coreana es preciso prevenir la guerra y defender la paz. 
					
					Todos los partidos y estratos surcoreanos deben participar en la lucha antiyanqui y anti-guerra por la paz al distinguir correctamente la naturaleza del pais norteamericano, caudillo de agresion y perturbador de la paz. 
					
					Deviene la demanda urgente de la lucha antiyanqui por la paz eliminar a los traidores proyanqui que sin tomar en consideracion el destino y el interes de su nacion traen las calamidades de guerra nuclear. 
					
					Todos los estratos surcoreanos deben levantarse en alto las velas de justicia que sentenciaron a la traidora Park Geun-hye y movilizarse firmemente en la lucha para exterminar a todos los conflictivos y maniacos de guerra.
					
					El Partido Social-Democrata de Corea esta convencido de que los partidos politicos, entidades y diversos estratos surcoreanos, amantes a la justicia y la paz, responderan a nuestro llamamiento patriotico y se levantaran con osadia en la lucha sagrada contra la guerra y por la defensa de la paz y la reunificacion independiente.

articles.title: Partido Chondoista Chong-U llama a los surcoreanos a la defensa de la paz
articles.content:
Partido Chondoista Chong-U llama a los surcoreanos a la defensa de la paz
Pyongyang, 31 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Comite Central del Partido Chondoista Chong-U envio el dia 31 un llamamiento a los partidos politicos, entidades y personalidades de diferentes circulos del Sur de Corea.
					El llamamiento califica los ejercicios belicos conjuntos que se libran ahora en el Sur de Corea como alborotos mas crueles y cinicos para provocar la segunda guerra coreana, y continua:
					
					Ahora, la guerra se hace una realidad en el territorio coreano. Y la nacion coreana se encuentra en el dilema de sufrir los desastres de guerra nuclear impuestos por las fuerzas extranjeras o defender la seguridad nacional y la paz con sus propias fuerzas unidas.
					
					Ahora, es el momento en que todos los que aman el pais y nacion y se preocupan del destino de la nacion deben levantarse como un solo hombre en la sagrada lucha patriotica para prevenir el peligro de la guerra nuclear y defender la paz anteponiendo la causa nacional a las fracciones partidistas, las creencias religiosas y los criterios propios. 
					
					El Comite Central del Partido Chondoista Chong-U llama a los partidos politicos, entidades y personalidades de diferentes estratos a levantarse unanimemente en la lucha por defender la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y la seguridad de la nacion frente a la grave situacion actual.
					
					La paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana es una cuestion vital relacionada directamente con el destino de la nacion coreana. 
					
					De la defensa de la paz dependen los medios de vida de la nacion, la reunificacion de la patria y la prosperidad comun de la nacion.
					
					Todos los partidos y diferentes circulos del Sur de Corea deben rechazar tajantemente los alborotos de guerra de agresion anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, que pueden imponer los desastres nucleares a la nacion coreana, sosteniendo en alto la consigna de la lucha antiyanqui, anti-guerra y por la paz. 
					
					La defensa de la seguridad nacional y la paz es inimaginable al margen de la lucha por eliminar a los traidores proyanquis que recurren al enfrentamiento fratricida y a la provocacion de guerra. 
					
					Todos los chondoistas del Norte y el Sur deben unirse y tomar la delantera en la justa lucha patriotica contra las imprudentes maniobras de provocacion militar y de guerra nuclear de las fuerzas belicistas internas y externas.

articles.title: Park Geun-hye mandada a la Prision de Seul
articles.content:
Park Geun-hye mandada a la Prision de Seul
Pyongyang, 31 de marzo (ACNC) -- En medio de la intensa lucha de los habitantes surcoreanos por la detencion de Park Geun-hye destituida del cargo de "presidenta", tuvo lugar el dia 30 en el Tribunal Local Central de Seul el examen de la orden para decidir el encierro de esa traidora.
					  El tribunal juzgo la necesidad de detencion y 13 cargos que pesan a Park, revelados en el proceso de investigacion de la fiscalia, entre ellos, el recibo del dinero para soborno, el abuso del poder y la ventilacion de secretos de trabajo.
					
					  En esta ocasion tambien, Park y el panel de abogados pagados rehusaron todas las sospechas de delito.
					
					  Pero, el tribunal emitio la orden de detencion al sacar la conclusion de que son evidentes las sospechas de crimen de Park Geun-hye y hay la posibilidad de la fuga o la eliminacion de pruebas por ella.
					
					  A la madrugada del dia 31, Park fue mandada a la Prision de Seul y encerrada en una celda a los 21 dias de su dimision.
					
					  Ella fue privada totalmente de los tratos preferenciales que se dan a la ex "presidenta" y sera sometida a la investigacion adicional de la fiscalia y al juicio penal en el estado de encarcelada.
					
					  Asi quedo registrada en la historia como la primera "presidenta" destituida y la encarcelada por tercera vez despues de Chun Doo Hwan y Roh Thae Woo.
					
					  Los medios de prensa y la abrumadora mayoria de la poblacion surcoreana exigen fuertemente el castigo severo a la traidora aplaudiendo la decision de encarcelamiento.
					
					  Actualmente, las fuentes extranjeras se hacen eco de la misma noticia.
